name: Strange Telephone
description: Strange Telephone is a 2D adventure game in which the player explores strange worlds created with merely 6 digits, and has multiple endings.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP SP2+ Процессор: SSE2 instruction set support or greater Видеокарта: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or greater DirectX: Версии 9.0
